name: Grusel
description:
[NOTE: This game is in development, some major features such as animation/mechanics are missing]

Grusel is a first person horror game set in an evacuated WWII era German bunker. Find all of the keys and escape while avoiding the one that remains.

WIP 2020 Horror game made by Team 3 for the Team project module at the University of Derby.

Credits:

Levent Liversidge - Artist, Project Lead

Shay Pearson - Programming/Mechanics/AI

Katarina Connor - Artist

Brook Charlesworth - Character Artist/Animation

Laura Smith - Character Artist

Lewis Grant - Programming/UI

Lee Corbett - Programming/AI
